Posts.Content: manuela wrote: I am 38 years old, and I live in Italy.  I just recently got diagnosed with "Sarcomatoid metaplastic carcinoma" of the breast, suddenly after my second pregnancy , during my first few months of breast feeding.  My doctors have no experience with this type of cancer and I am frantically trying to find places where I can turn.   I have found one clinic that might be able to help but since the consultation could take up to 2 weeks to get started im trying to find other possibilites. Any help would be greatly appreciated! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: "Sarcomatoid metaplastic carcinoma" manuela Shirlann
